text: Lara Villata (born 19 April 1967) is an Italian equestrian. She was in three Olympic competitions. She was in the 1992 Summer Olympics. She was also in the 1996 Summer Olympics and the 2000 Summer Olympics. She had a horse named Spartacus. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1967 births Category:1992 Summer Olympics Category:1996 Summer Olympics Category:2000 Summer Olympics Category:Event riders Category:Italian equestrians Category:Olympians for Italy Category:Sportspeople from Turin Category:Olympic equestrians for Italy
title: Lara Villata
